strategy: Chaos Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 4. Alpha Legion armies are also subject to 'The Harrowing' special rule.
Initiative: Cultist Coven and Cultist Support formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Alpha Legion with Traitor Imperial Guard allies.

formations.name: Cultist Coven
formations.units: One Aspiring Champion, nine Chaos Cultists and/or Mutants, Daemonic Pact
extraUnits: Add enough Land Transporters to transport the formation with no space left over: 10 points each
Add four Chaos Cultists and/or Mutants: 10 points each
Replace up to six Chaos Cultists and/or Mutants with Big Mutants: 15 points each
Add up to three Ragnarok Heavy Tanks: 50 points each

sections.name: Alpha Legion Elite Detachments
sections.description: Up to one Alpha Legion Elite Detachment for each Cultist Coven.

formations.name: Alpha Legion Marines
formations.units: One Alpha Legion Lord or Alpha Legion Sorcerer, four Alpha Legion Marines plus transport
extraUnits: Replace two Alpha Legion Marines with two Alpha Legion Havocs: 35 points
Add up to two Alpha Legion Land Raiders: 50 points each

formations.name: Terminators
formations.units: One Alpha Legion Lord or Alpha Legion Sorcerer, four Lernaean Terminators plus transport
extraUnits: Add up to three Alpha Legion Land Raiders: 50 points each

formations.name: Headhunters
formations.units: One Alpha Legion Lord or Alpha Legion Sorcerer, four Headhunters plus transport

sections.name: Cultist Support Formations
sections.description: Up to one Cultist Support Formations per Cultist Coven

formations.name: Cultist Cavalry
formations.units: Six Death Riders, four Chaos Hounds, Daemonic Pact

formations.name: Heavy Mortar Battery
formations.units: Three Heavy Mortars, two Big Mutants

sections.name: Alpha Legion Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Alpha Legion Navy.

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

upgrades.title: Alpha Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Choose one of the following options:
Replace the Aspiring Champion with a Daemon Prince
'I'm Alpharius!' The army benefits from the Supreme Commander rule as long as there is at least one Alpha Legion Lord on the battlefield.
Add up to two Alpha Legion Dreadnoughts
